      Add an edge to this graph.
      Parameters:
      v - the first endpoint of the edge
      w - the second endpoint of the edge
      data - data to be associated with the new edge
      name - name to be associated with the new edge

    • opposite

      public Vertex opposite(Vertex v, Edge e)
      Given a vertex and an edge, if the vertex is one of the endpoints of the edge, return the other endpoint of the edge. Otherwise, return null.
      Parameters:
      v - a vertex
      e - an edge
